name: Student Enrollment System
description: An efficient system for enrolling new students, managing their information, and tracking admissions.

name: Teacher Attendance Tracker
description: A tool to record and monitor teacher attendance, ensuring a smooth teaching schedule.

name: School Library Catalog
description: A comprehensive catalog of books and resources  school library, aiding students in research and reading.

name: Parent-Teacher Communication
description: A platform for seamless communication between parents and teachers to discuss student progress.

name: Class Scheduling System
description: A scheduling system that optimizes class timetables, making the best use of available resources.

name: Student Report Cards
description: A tool to generate and distribute student report cards, providing insights into academic performance.
